column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My wife and I flew on an airplane a couple of months ago .
#id=2
#text=We were going to Las Vegas because a friend of mine was getting married .
#id=3
#text=He lives there and said that he would pick us up from the airport .
#id=4
#text=But , the weather here was cold and there was freezing rain , so our flight was delayed for two hours .
#id=5
#text=It was kind of scary taking off because the weather was still cold and rainy , but after two hours of sitting there waiting , I was ready to go .
#id=6
#text=People on the flight were pretty happy to finally leave and a lot of people were having drinks .
#id=7
#text=Everyone was getting ready for their own little party in Las Vegas .
#id=8
#text=The flight itself took a little over four hours due to the fact that we had a non-stop flight .
#id=9
#text=I was glad I paid the extra money for not making any stops .
#text=Six hours sitting on an airplane is more than enough for me .
#text=The flight was pretty uneventful except for the lively passengers , so that was a good thing , especially since my wife hates to fly .
#text=My friend ended up still picking us up from the airport and we had a great time in Las Vegas .
